com.risk.model

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.model.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the game board as a singleton it maintains the list of players as well as the map it provides all objects and methods needed for presentation the game
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Kourosh Aziz-Nejad

      • StartupGame

        public void StartupGame(int prm_playerNum)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        this method start up the game it takes the number of players, then creates players and then assign countries evenly to players then builds the deck next it set the current player based on round-robin fashion next initializes the phase
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the number of player is less than 2 or greater than 5

        Parameters:
        playerNum - , which is integer, is the number of players that user spesifies at the beginning of the game

      • SaveMapToFile

        public int SaveMapToFile(java.lang.String input)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        this method will save the current map into a file in the format of Conquest rules
        Parameters:
        input, - which its type is string, is the file in which the map will be saved
        Returns:
        , which its type is integer, is 1 if the save is successful and is 0 if it is failed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if continents are less than 1 or countries are less than 5 the exception will be thrown

      • EndFortificationPhase

        public void EndFortificationPhase()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        this method ends the reinforcement phase this set the turn-organizer to reinforcement phase also it causes the turn to change also it recalculate the armies for the current player
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is now card left

      • ExchangeThreeSameCardsByPlayerId

        public int ExchangeThreeSameCardsByPlayerId(int prm_playerId)
        this method exchange cards for armies for a given player if the given player has three same cards the method decks those cards and gives the player 5 armies
        Parameters:
        prm_playerId - is the id of the player
        Returns:
        1 if the exchange is done successfully, otherwise 0

      • ExchangeThreeDifferentCardsByPlayerId

        public int ExchangeThreeDifferentCardsByPlayerId(int prm_playerId)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        this method exchange cards for armies for a given player if the given player has three different cards the method decks those cards and gives the player 5 armies
        Parameters:
        prm_playerId - is the id of the player
        Returns:
        1 if the exchange is done successfully, otherwise 0
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the player has no three different cards

      • ExchangeCards

        public int ExchangeCards(int prm_playerId)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        this method exchange cards for armies for a given player if the given player has three same cards or three different cards the method decks those cards and gives the player 5 armies
        Parameters:
        prm_playerId - is the id of the player
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is no three different or same cards
